skills.name: Touch of Seduction
skills.description: Attacks the enemy and decreases its Attack Power for 2 turns with a 50% chance.
skills.level_progress_description:
Damage +5%
Effect Rate +10%
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +20%

skills.name: Curse of the Beautiful
skills.description: Attacks all enemies 3 times to decrease the Defense, increase their chances of landing a glancing hit and disturb their HP recovery for 2 turns with a 50% chance.
skills.level_progress_description:
Effect Rate +5%
Effect Rate +10%
Effect Rate +10%
Damage +15%
Cooltime Turn -1

skill_effect.name: AOE
skill_effect.description: Applies skill to more than one target

skill_effect.name: Disturb HP Recovery
skill_effect.description: Healing effects are blocked for a number of turns

skill_effect.name: Glancing Hit
skill_effect.description: Accuracy is reduced by 50% and the chance for the monster to land a Glancing Hit of reduced damage will increase.

skill_effect.name: Multiple Hits
skill_effect.description: Attack hits more than 1 time per use.

skills.name: Charming Voice
skills.description: Attacks an enemy, stealing all beneficial effects and sets all of the enemy's skills on max cool down.

skill_effect.name: Increase Cooltime
skill_effect.description: Puts the target's skill on cool down.

skill_effect.name: Remove Buff
skill_effect.description: Removes one or more beneficial effects from target monster(s)

skill_effect.name: Steal Buff
skill_effect.description: Remove a beneficial effect and take it for yourself
